website_summaries.verdict: People who were in search of comfortable and supportive footwear were pretty pleased with the Propet Stability Walker Strap. Many commenters liked that it was easy to put on and was also stylish. The availability of various width options and its reasonable price also bode well for shoppers. However, there were complaints that even the wider widths fit too tight. The stiff construction also made the shoe uncomfortable to wear for some people. But in the end, the trainer came highly recommended for people looking for a reliable and comfortable walking footwear.
pros: The Propet Stability Walker Strap exceeded the expectations of owners when it came to comfort
some claimed that it helped to relieve foot, leg, and back pain
Many consumers liked the style of the footwear
Droves of wearers found the arch support on this model to be adequate in keeping the foot stable
Numerous users marked this trainer as true to size and width
they adored that it came in various width options
The product was considered affordable by a considerable number of purchasers
Plenty of reviewers enjoyed the strap closure mechanism because it made the shoe easy to wear
A lot of folks praised the merchandise for its durability
cons: A good number of shoppers complained that even the broader options of the Propet Stability Walker Strap were tight and narrow
The shoe was not as comfortable as multiple critics had hoped for
The trainer was bulky and heavy, said several of the buyers
The collar was high which caused chafing for some people
A few individuals commented that this model was not very durable
it developed tears and the sole unit detached with just a few months of use

customer_reviews.title: a risky choice for your feet
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing these shoes forover a year. at first I bought them because I was having a problem tieing my laces. tehnI was having a problem staying on my feet. I fell twice while wearing these "stability" shoes. after the second fall (sustained an injury both times) I realized I was falling because these shoes were not stable. the straps were fine,at first,but then loosened. You cannot make the straps tighter. Then I realized how much looser they had become. I would not recommend this type of shoe to anyone because of the strap. It loosens with time and you could break your neck wearing them.
customer_reviews.author: remove

customer_reviews.title: A bit tight, get yourself a good set of shoe trees.
customer_reviews.text: Tighter than I expected. After using a shoe tree on them for a couple of days they fit much better. I did get an excellent price for them though. The price went up right after I ordered.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I'm not foolish enough to think I will lose weight wearing these shoes (although the are the heaviest tennis shoes I have ever worn). That said, these are the finest sneakers I have ever used. I am retired and have a part time job that requires me to stay on my feet for four hours at a time. Always, I have had foot pain. I have tried several different brands, orthotics, Dr. Sholl's, wedges-no help. These made all the difference in the world. I'm buying more!
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: but so far looks good.
customer_reviews.text: these shoes fit and feel extremely well ! I have not had them long enough to speak on the ware of the shoes,but so far looks good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It was perfect for his needs
customer_reviews.text: My husband has Parkinson's Disease and has had a number of injuries from falls. He also has a bit of a bunion on one foot. He has worn and likes the Propet Lifewalker style shoe in a 4E width but the slightly wider 5E width and wider sole of this Stability Walker gives a bit more room in the toe box and more secure footing. It was perfect for his needs.
customer_reviews.author: Rae in TN

customer_reviews.title: Shoe runs small in size.
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoes but way too small, I couldn't even close the straps properly. Run small and narrow. Unwearable for me.
customer_reviews.author: Bill B.

customer_reviews.title: Propet shoes
customer_reviews.text: love these shoes and hope they never stop making them and keep them at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DON’T BUY!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Leather started to tear after 2 days (5 December 2018) of wear. Video taken on 14 January 2019
customer_reviews.author: James Sr

customer_reviews.title: Good Basic Shoe
customer_reviews.text: great basic shoes for general wear, walking, exercising; last pair lasted three years and many miles
customer_reviews.author: MacGeezer

customer_reviews.title: Runs small this time
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the same size in the past, these are a bit small!
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Patrick

customer_reviews.title: The width and height of the arch was too tight.
customer_reviews.text: The width of the toes was as expected for wide width, and the toe box fit well. However the arch was too tight and not wide enough.
customer_reviews.author: C. Lopez

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THE SHOES
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS PRODUCT, IT HELP WITH ALL THE SUPPORT THAT I NEEDED
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Arreola

customer_reviews.title: BEST GRIP ON ANY SURFACE!
customer_reviews.text: Best grip on any surface - period! Very good fit and support.
customer_reviews.author: DON HEIBERGER

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit.
customer_reviews.text: Got perfect. Narrow shoes for men are difficult to find.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: sizing is hard to find  these are perfect
customer_reviews.text: I would recomiend to familyand friends thank you , john hopkins
customer_reviews.author: John Hopkins

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Really nice shoes. Fit just right and look good. There should be little or no break in time with these.
customer_reviews.author: Old- Salt

customer_reviews.title: Good Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Good for the price but can't compete with the comfort & fit of my New Balance shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Frank DeMasi

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: Shoe appears to be well made. I have only worn these to go grocery shopping so far. They look very nice and were comfortable. The velcro straps made shoes easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Kurt

customer_reviews.title: A tight fit
customer_reviews.text: A nice shoe but must run small in the width and I ordered a half size larger than normal.
customer_reviews.author: KW1K

customer_reviews.title: Comfy!
customer_reviews.text: My dad id 6'8" and weighs about 325lbs. He loves these shoes and can walk for longer times with out having to rest his feet!
customer_reviews.author: Maddie

customer_reviews.title: Too Tight of a Fit. UNWEARABLE
customer_reviews.text: Fits way too tight. I cannot wear these shoes for any walking regardless how short of a distance.
customer_reviews.author: rwk1951

customer_reviews.title: They are small for size
customer_reviews.text: When wearing they are extremely tight on the flat part of foot. I have only been wearing them in the last week. See that date to return has passed but would like to return
customer_reviews.author: Eugene Booen

customer_reviews.title: Will order again as he would
customer_reviews.text: My husband really likes and he has trouble tying his shoes. He thinks they’re great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: these are some of the best shoes i've purchased
customer_reviews.text: these are some of the best shoes i've purchased! great for retired old guy! I even bought a second pair
customer_reviews.author: WG

customer_reviews.title: Very poor quality in manufacturing.
customer_reviews.text: The shoe sole has started to separate from the shoe and it will cause a tripping hazard. I contacted the Propet-USA Co and they ssaid basicly that they could care less about the apparend defects of the shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice shoes for a diabetic person
customer_reviews.text: Very nice shoes for a diabetic person, I took out the insole and placed my diabetic insoles in. Fits great, feels good when I walk.
customer_reviews.author: mark yost

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: smashed toes and width make a good shoe feel bad.
customer_reviews.author: R.J. Petrone

customer_reviews.title: Propet stability walker
customer_reviews.text: The very best walking shoe I have ever purchased. Very resilient and resistnat to scuffs and tears, unlike meny others I have tried.
customer_reviews.author: G. Marlow

customer_reviews.title: Misleading labels
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed 3 or 4 years ago I purchased this shoe size 10.1/2 XX (5E), and they were way too wide for my feet, but none the less I used them now and then. Now that I am 87 years old, I ordered the same shoe 10 1/2 but size D (medium), and I got shoes size 10 and NARROW!!!. Reading others comments, I realized that I am not the only one to have been shortchanged by this not very serious Propet Co.
customer_reviews.author: Armando Brons

product_meta.title: Propét Men's M2035b Stability Walker Strap
product_meta.description: Full-grain, perforated leather upper with brushed nylon lining
feature_bullets: Adjustable hook and loop closure with padded collar and tongue
Rigid heel counter with removable pu footbed
A5500 medicare approved for diabetic footwear
